thumbnail.description: Painting by artist Michel Malm. A family is scaling a gentle slope, the mother carries an infant, the father has a young child on his back. A boy to the right of the parents carries a walking stick. A girl in the right foreground stands holding a basket and is smiling at the family. A daughter walks in front, and has her left arm raised pointing to the Savior in the distance. He stands with arms partly outstretched, teaching a small group of men and women who are standing or seated around Him. Behind the group is an outcropping of rock, the sky has colored tints of morning.
thumbnail.publicAltText: Pianting by
thumbnail.seoDescription: Painting by artist Michel Malm. A family is scaling a gentle slope, the mother carries an infant, the father has a young child on his back. A boy to the right of the parents carries a walking stick. A girl in the right foreground stands holding a basket and is smiling at the family. A daughter walks in front, and has her left arm raised pointing to the Savior in the distance. He stands with arms partly outstretched,  teaching a small group of men and women who are standing or seated around Him. Behind the group is an outcropping of rock, the sky has colored tints of morning.
thumbnail.shareableDescription: Painting by artist Michel Malm. A family is scaling a gentle slope, the mother carries an infant, the father has a young child on his back. A boy to the right of the parents carries a walking stick. A girl in the right foreground stands holding a basket and is smiling at the family. A daughter walks in front, and has her left arm raised pointing to the Savior in the distance. He stands with arms partly outstretched, teaching a small group of men and women who are standing or seated around Him. Behind the group is an outcropping of rock, the sky has colored tints of morning.
thumbnail.title: October 2024 General Conference

thumbnail.publicAltText: An illustration showing the start of written sheet music, along with varying figures drawn over the staff lines. The trebble clef, a B flat key and 4/4 time signature are visible, along with the first few notes of the song. At the top of the image is a simple cream and purple plane. On the top musical staff line, purple and yellow flowers, a golf cart, and a man with a golf club are shown on a field.  On the lower staff line, a  family of three (a man, woman, and child) with black hair are drawn surrounded by pots, pans, and shelves, as if they are praying  in a kitchen. A little car and simply drawn trees are to the right and left of them respectively. A person riding a gray horse with a blue saddle is to the right of the family.
thumbnail.title: Songs of Devotion

On the lower staff line, a  family of three (a man, woman, and child) with black hair are drawn surrounded by pots, pans, and shelves, as if they are praying  in a kitchen. A little car and simply drawn trees are to the right and left of them respectively. A person riding a gray horse with a blue saddle is to the right of the family.
thumbnail.title: Songs of Devotion
